m_szDocTitle: Why Apple shares are ripe for picking - MarketWatch
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- JeffReeves Columnist Anyone considering an investment in Apple stock faces a challenge. The company is huge, its shares are volatile, and its moves are widely followed on Wall Street. Yet still, this is a good time to buy shares of Apple AAPL, +1.98% In fact, you may already have a stake in the tech titan if you own a S&P 500 index SPX, +0.53%   fund. As a market-cap weighted index, the S&P’s largest position is Apple, with a market value of around $550 billion that is worth more than the 90 smallest S&P 500 components combined.
